title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.5 - Adjournment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.5 - Adjournment

State Regulations
A request for an adjournment of the hearing should be in
writing and submitted to the hearing officer and other parties prior to the
hearing. Adjournments shall be granted only by the hearing officer and only
after the hearing officer has consulted all parties. When granted, adjournments
should be to a specified time, day and place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
